title: PHP Web Developer (f/m/d) gefunden bei zooplus Austria GmbH
subtitle: Wien, Vienna 1020
body:
Über diese Stellenanzeige

  • Developing and continuously delivering applications for one of the most successful e-commerce platforms in Europe to enable our growing and successful business
  • Working in a Scrum environment and taking part in all parts of the software life cycle from concept through coding to testing and maintaining
  • Work autonomously surrounded in a pleasant working environment
  • Get fascinated by discovering and solving the digital challenges of delivering a full e-commerce stack
  • Strive for mastery in a challenging agile environment using state-of-the-art technologies
  • Working in PHP projects and we might work on Python projects in the future
  • The gross annual salary for this position is 45,000 - 65,000 EUR depending on qualification and experience
Job melden
